document.full_text: a federal appeals court on monday lifted legal stays that have been blocking the state's effort to collect $4.35 on each pack sold by indian-owned businesses to non-indians.
document.title: ruling clears new york state to tax tribes' cigarette sales
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court on monday lifted legal stays that have been blocking the state's effort to collect $4.35 on each pack sold by indian-owned businesses to non-indians.
